save(String) - Method in class org.CAP5400.Image.Image
This method saves the image to the specified file name.
scale(ROI, float) - Static method in class org.CAP5400.Toolbox.Toolbox
This method scales a region of interest (ROI) within an image by a specified ratio.
setChannel(int[], int) - Method in class org.CAP5400.Image.Image
This method sets the pixel array of the image.

This method sets the pixel value at the specified row and column.
setPixel(int, int, int, int) - Method in class org.CAP5400.Image.Image
This method sets the pixel value at the specified row, column, and channel.
sharpenEdge(ROI, String, int, int, double) - Static method in class org.CAP5400.Toolbox.Toolbox
This method sharpens the edges of a region of interest (ROI) within an image.
sharpenEdges(int, double) - Method in class org.CAP5400.Toolbox.Fourier
Method that sharpens the edges of an image using unsharp masking.

This annotation is used to specify if a string is one of a set of values.
